JOHAN, a gay cinema cult classic, was screened at the 1976 Cannes Film Festival before disappearing in a whirl of censorship. This new release presents the complete, un-edited story of a young man awaiting his lover's release from prison, and the many erotic encounters he seeks out in the meantime.
